t.span: Your version of OpenERP is unsupported. Support & maintenance services are available here: OpenERP Entreprise.

div.div: Your report will be sent to the OpenERP Enterprise team.

a.t-att-class: classname + (menu.children.length ? ' submenu' : ' leaf') + (menu_first and level == 1 ? ' opened' : '')

input.name: ufile
input.title: Add attachment
input.t-att-onclick: view.datarecord.id ? null : 'alert(\'No record selected ! You can only attach to existing record.\'); return false;'

button.title: Send an e-mail with your default e-mail client

div.p: (Any existing filter with the same name will be replaced)

p.b: Select Dashboard to add this filter to:

select.option: Any of the following conditions must match
All the following conditions must match
None of the following conditions must match

tr.td: This wizard will export all data that matches the current search criteria to a CSV file. You can export all data or only the fields that can be reimported after modification.

tr.th: Fields to export Save fields list

form.name: import_data
form.p: Select a .CSV file to import. If you need a sample of file to import, you should use the export tool with the "Import Compatible" option.

label.title: For use if CSV files have titles on multiple lines, skips more than a single line during import

t.p: Here is a preview of the file we could not import:
